products.name: iPhone 12 Pro
products.detail: The iPhone 12 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, powered by the A14 Bionic chip. With a pro camera system and LiDAR scanner, it offers stunning photography, faster performance, and premium build quality.

products.name: Pixel 5
products.detail: Google Pixel 5 comes with a 6-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 765G processor, and the best-in-class camera software. Known for its clean Android experience and guaranteed updates directly from Google.

products.name: M1 Macbook Air
products.desc: Apple Macbook air with apple silicon
products.detail: The MacBook Air with M1 chip delivers blazing fast performance, all-day battery life, and a fanless design. Perfect for students and professionals, it supports macOS seamlessly with optimized apps for Apple Silicon.

products.name: Playstation 5
products.detail: The PS5 redefines gaming with its lightning-fast SSD, 4K gaming capabilities, and DualSense controller featuring haptic feedback. Supports the latest AAA titles and backwards compatibility for PS4 games.

products.name: Airpods Pro
products.detail: AirPods Pro offer Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound, Transparency mode to hear your surroundings, and a customizable fit for all-day comfort. Powered by the H1 chip for seamless Apple ecosystem integration.

products.name: iPad Pro
products.detail: The iPad Pro is powered by the Apple M1 chip, offering desktop-class performance in a thin tablet. Features a Liquid Retina display with ProMotion and Face ID, making it ideal for creatives and professionals.

products.name: Galaxy S21 Ultra
products.detail: Samsungâ€™s Galaxy S21 Ultra comes with a massive 6.8-inch AMOLED 120Hz display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and a powerful quad-camera system with 100x Space Zoom. A premium device for power users.

products.name: Galaxy S21
products.detail: The Galaxy S21 offers flagship performance with a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 2100/Snapdragon 888 chipset, and a triple-camera setup. Sleek design and great value in the S21 lineup.
